post:
Now through Monday BlueVM is having a sale on it's OpenVZ VPS in Illinois. Deals include:

**BLUE1** - Normally $28.00 /Yr NOW: $20 /Yr (**Coupon Code:** ILLINOIS1)
256 MB of Guaranteed RAM
512 MB of Burstable RAM
1 CPU @ 2.0+ Ghz
1 IP Address
10 GB of Disk
500 GB of Bandwidth
<a href="https://www.bluevm.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=159">Click Here To Order</a>

**BLUE3** - Normally $80.00 /Yr NOW: $39 /Yr (**Coupon Code:** ILLINOIS3)
1024 MB of Guaranteed RAM
2048 MB of Burstable RAM
3 CPU @ 2.0+ Ghz
1 IP Address
50 GB of Disk
2 TB of Bandwidth
<a href="https://www.bluevm.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=169">Click Here To Order</a>

**Quick FAQ:**
Q: Why does this deal only apply to Illinois?
A: We have some extra space on our Illinois nodes that we'd like to fill.

Q: Can I transfer this VPS to another one of your locations?
A: Yes you can, simply submit a ticket after purchasing and we will move your VPS.

Q: Will the price be the same next year?
A: Yes as always our prices are locked in for the life of your VPS.

Q: What is your network speed? Can I have some test files or IPs?
A: Our network is at 1 Gbps and here's the test information:

Test IP: s3.c56.il.bluevm.com
Test File: http://s3.c56.il.bluevm.com/100mb.test
